column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I would pay you if you show me better ramen place in Houston! There are so many ramen options on the menu
column2: so I can't even decide what to choose every time I get there. It's a shame that at first I was a bit hesitant about a spot like that
column3: but it impressed me. If you decide to visit Jinya Ramen Bar
column4: you really must try extra pork! The other winners are the potstickers
column6: the Jinya bun and the shrimp balls!
